item.title: Comment on “California officials cite Elon Musk’s politics in rejecting SpaceX launches” by PaulD
item.description:
Congratulations Commissioner Newsom. You've just given Musk the ammunition for a lawsuit against the state, one he will win and cost the state millions of dollars.

item.title: Comment on “California officials cite Elon Musk’s politics in rejecting SpaceX launches” by Reason
item.description:
Reply to Ringo:

Congratulations to SpaceX on a historic accomplishment this morning - amazing - catching the rocket is unreal!

What an engineering triumph.

This is what real people do, while those who can do nothing but destroy value go into journalism and activism.

Extirpate the Left from the West. Every one of its vessels must be obliterated.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/california-officials-cite-elon-musks-politics-in-rejecting-spacex-launches.html?commentID=160822515

item.title: Comment on The Missing Dockworkers by Hadur
item.description:
Let's say port automation and other port reforms that the union opposes makes ports far more profitable and efficient, generating tremendous wealth. Let's further say that all union members care about is money.

Why isn't the solution just pensioning off the current dockworkers and guaranteeing them a lifetime income even if they are replaced by machines? That way we can have port automation and port efficiency and the union can still have money.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/the-missing-dockworkers.html?commentID=160822441

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/the-missing-dockworkers.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-missing-dockworkers

Votes: 49⬆ 6⬇
item.dc:creator: Hadur

item.title: Comment on The Missing Dockworkers by Tom T.
item.description:
Reply to Tom T.:

That's how one gets rid of dictators in the third world, after all.

Submitted too soon. The problem is that, like dictators, they want their kids to get these same lucrative jobs too.
